files.patch:
@@ -779,2 +779,3 @@
-# can be disabled here using wildcard '*' syntax. For example "TLS_RSA_*"
-# disables all cipher suites that start with "TLS_RSA_"
+# can be disabled here using "*" wildcard syntax. For example "TLS_RSA_*"
+# disables all cipher suites that start with "TLS_RSA_". Only the algorithms
+# starting with "TLS_" are allowed to have "*" wildcard.
